article.title: L-3 to Provide Video Receiver Antenna Kits
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: L-3 Communications System West, Salt Lake City, Utah, was recently awarded a nearly $32 million contract to provide for 2,780 remote operational video enhanced receiver 6 antenna kits. The U.S. Army Aviation and Missile Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
